exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice f : T -> T x : T H : f x = x The term "T" has type "lattice" while it is expected to have type "?x <== ?y".

In environment T : lattice f : T -> T x : T H : f x = x Unable to unify "?M1464 (tarski_lfp ?M1464) = tarski_lfp ?M1464" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) (tarski_lfp f) x".

original: intros x H. apply (poset_trans T _ _ _ H). apply tarski_lfp_fixed.
